name: G Suite for Drive
description: This app allows various file manipulation actions to be performed on Google Drive

key_json.description: Contents of Service Account JSON file

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration

actions.verbose:
Action uses the Admin SDK API to get a list of users. Requires authorization with the following scope:
  • https://www.googleapis.com/auth/admin.directory.user

The action will limit the number of users returned to max_items or (if not specified) 500. If the system has any more users, a next page token will be returned in action_result.summary.next_page_token. Use this value as input to next_page_token in subsequent calls to list users.

max_items.description: Maximum number of users to return

example_values: File doesn't exist or has already been deleted
Successfully added new folder to Drive

actions.description: Upload a file from the Vault to Drive
actions.verbose: If the Drive API does not support the conversion from the files original MIME type to dest_mime_type, the uploaded file will become a native Google Drive type (e.g. a Google document).

source_mime_type.description: MIME type of file in vault

dest_mime_type.description: MIME type of new Drive file (will disable convert)

file_name.description: Set the file name in Drive

convert.description: Attempt to convert file to native Drive type. Will only have an effect if dest_mime_type is not set

example_values: Successfully added new file to Drive

actions.description: Get information about a file or download it to the Vault

download_file.description: Download the file to the Vault

mime_type.description: MIME Type for exported file. This will only have an effect if the original document is file type that needs to be exported (i.e. Google Docs / Sheets / Slides files)

file_name.description: Set a new name for the file before adding it to the vault

example_values: Failed to get file. Error string: '<HttpError 400 when requesting https://www.googleapis.com/drive/v3/files/12wNhYsdgesIzNyXfXZqI7l9GCs4yjoeZt-vSJaLo1fA?fields=all&alt=json returned "Invalid field selection all">'
Successfully retrieved file and added to vault
Successfully retrieved file information and added to vault

actions.verbose:
You can use the query parameter to filter the results. The full documentation on this parameter can be read here. Here are some examples:
  • mimeType='application/vnd.google-apps.folder': show only folders
  • modifiedTime > '2018-01-05T12:00:00' and mimeType='application/vnd.google-apps.document': Show only documents which have been modified since the date
